reviewText: The six episodes on this DVD are the ones that aired during the BFV *Summer Special* - also known as Season 2.5.  The Reunion, hosted by Wendy Williams,is also included. As a surprise, some bonus features and deleted scenes can be found. BFV is the best show on WeTv.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I have always loved Tony Braxton's music and now have had the opportunity to see her home life and the struggles and triumphs she had in her life.  It a good real life scenarios and I thank her for showing us the other side of her life.  The challenges she has with the other members of her family is sad, funny and reminds me of my own.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Although I purchased this product for a family member, I did view season 1 and I did enjoy most of it. I believe I would like season two once I get a chance to watch it, based upon what saw from season 1. If you are a fan of Toni, you would be interested in watching it just because of her.
